IncidentDef.label: psychic shriek
IncidentDef.letterText: Threatened anima forest released a terrifying shriek in the local area, disorienting all creatures. Colonists will become dazed for several hours.

IncidentDef.label: animal insanity pulse
IncidentDef.letterText: The Anima forest feeling threatened has emitted a psychic pulse that has driven all nearby animals mad.
